resources:
Make It Easy Make It Easy Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer //Headings Become Our Scholar Member Complete Notes & Sample Papers Live Doubts Clearing One-On-One Mentorship
//Description Make it easy #padhai is a platform every aspiring student should have it as a tool to learn, so becoming a scholar member can help students get through every difficulty in learning, classes and exams. Providing complete notes and sample paper of each unit will help students to get through revision cycles more appropriately. It helps in keeping in touch with the subject as well as possible to memorise the tough topics. Live doubt clearing session will be provided as a learning process for students and at the same time they can clear out their doubts related to anything about the subject matter. One on one mentorship will be provide to everyone which will help students to reach out the mentor and build a relationship between so that they can freely ask questions and answer at the same manner
